genericTagSentences.content: These steps are used to setup the context of tests config and user login
For now it is used to reflect the config needed (only manual purpose)
{question} See to use it with fixture import or to remove ?
(API + SIMPLE) -- the HCP is logged in the {projectName} project with {account}
Use to log the HCP in a particular project with a particular account

{string} projectName - Allows to set up the project URL by project's name
  --- Values : qacapture / wftest
{string} account - Reference to an HCP account (with/ without patient ...Etc) HCP account are defined in cypress/fixtures/user.ts
{DOC} >> add list of values possible like "param values" ? link to user.ts ?

{SIMPLE} >> reduce the number of hcp possible / simplify
  HCP without data (neither patient nor visit)
